text: Milan Štrljić (born 22 March 1952) is a Croatian actor and theatre director.Milan Štrljić: Ne bih volio biti glumica jer se danas gledaju samo lice i tijelo! He appeared in more than ninety films since 1972. ==Personal life== Štrljić has a daughter Iva, who is also an actress, from his first marriage with Slavica Štrljić of Serb ethnicity. ==Selected filmography== ===Television roles=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
